reasoning: Ileal pouch-anal anastomosis (IPAA) is a surgically created pouch performed in patients with ulcerative colitis or familial adenomatous polyposis. Reported both incidence (~0.8 per 100k new procedures annually in developed countries) and prevalence (~2.5 per 100k living with pouches) due to both the procedure rate and chronic post-surgical status.
source: American Society of Colon and Rectal Surgeons
